text: Zvirokwazvo, ndivo vanotumira mhepo ichiratidza rombo ranaka pamberi petsitsi dzavo (mvura). Kusvikira yatakura makore akaremerwa (nemvura), tinowatumira kune nzvimbo iyo yakaoma, uye tinokonzera mvura kuti ive inodzika ikoko. Uye tinoburitsa nayo (mvura) mhando yese yemichero. Saizvozvo tichave tinomutsa avo vakafa, kuti mungava munorangarira
